POSTED_BY.description: The person who posted the listing. It can be the owner, a dealer or a builder.

value_dict.Owner: The house listing was posted by the owner.
value_dict.Dealer: The house listing was posted by a dealer.
value_dict.Builder: The house listing was posted by a builder.

UNDER_CONSTRUCTION.description: Indicates whether the house is under construction. 0 means not under construction and 1 means under construction.

RERA.description: Indicates whether the house is RERA approved. 0 means not approved and 1 means approved.

BHK_NO..description: The number of bedrooms in the house.

BHK_OR_RK.description: Type of the house. It can be a bedroom-hall-kitchen (BHK) or a room-kitchen (RK).

value_dict.BHK: The house is a Bedroom-Hall-Kitchen type.
value_dict.RK: The house is a Room-Kitchen type.

SQUARE_FT.description: The area of the house in square feet.

READY_TO_MOVE.description: Indicates whether the house is ready to move in. 0 means not ready and 1 means ready.

RESALE.description: Indicates whether the house is for resale. 0 means not for resale and 1 means for resale.

LONGITUDE.description: The geographical longitude of the house.

LATITUDE.description: The geographical latitude of the house.

TARGET(PRICE_IN_LACS).description: The price of the house in lacs.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in real estate market analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the property, please predict the target price in lacs.
prompt.answer_prompt: The target price in lacs is.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in property size estimation.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the property, please predict the square footage.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in property type analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the property, please predict the number of bedrooms.
